```{r}

library(plotly)

library(ggplot2)

# library(car)

N <- 100

x <- trunc(runif(N, 1, 5)) # uniform x from 1 to 5

m <- rbinom(N, 1, .5) # binomial moderator

# e <- rnorm(N, 0, 10)

y <- x + m + .1 * x * m 

# m <- factor(m)

# scatter3d(x = x, y = m, z = y)

mydata <- data.frame(x, m , y)

```

```{r}

p1 <- plot_ly(data = mydata, 
              x = ~x, 
              y = ~y,
              color = ~factor(m), 
              colors = "Set1",
              text = ~paste("x:", x, 
                            '<br>m:', m),
              hoverinfo = 'text',
              mode = 'lines+markers',
              marker = list(size = 10))

p1

```

```{r}

p2 <- plot_ly(data = mydata, 
              x = ~m, 
              y = ~y,
              color = ~factor(x), 
              colors = "Set1",
              text = ~paste("x:", x, 
                            '<br>m:', m),
              hoverinfo = 'text',
              mode = 'lines+markers',
              marker = list(size = 10))

p2

```
